title: LEIF Service 2 outputs
description: This document records the outputs of the LEIF Service 2 system

properties.title: Electricity produced by solar panels
properties.description: The amount of electricity produced by the solar panels, which are installed in the project.

properties.title: Primary energy consumption after
properties.description: Primary energy consumption after installing the solar panel system.

properties.title: Reduction of primary energy consumption
properties.description: Reduction of primary energy consumption: Difference between primary energy consumption before and after.

properties.title: CO2 emissions reduction
properties.description: The amount of CO2 emissions reduction in the project.

properties.title: Expected annual self consumption
properties.description: The expected annual self-consumption of the electricity produced by the solar panels.

properties.title: Annual financial savings
properties.description: The annual financial savings produced by installation of solar panels.

properties.title: Payback period
properties.description: The payback period of the investment in the solar panel system.
